title: 帮我看看什么原因
author: 水煮清娃
txt_content:
服务器正常开启,但是后台隔一段时间就报错,提示块未能保存，能力有限看不出什么名堂来，特求帮助~


[04:07:59] [File IO Thread/ERROR]: Failed to save chunk

java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 786, Size: 645
        at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(ArrayList.java:653) ~[?:1.8.0_121]
        at java.util.ArrayList.set(ArrayList.java:444) ~[?:1.8.0_121]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.RegionFile.a(RegionFile.java:211) ~[patched_1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1079]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.RegionFile$ChunkBuffer.close(RegionFile.java:318) ~[patched_1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1079]
        at java.util.zip.DeflaterOutputStream.close(DeflaterOutputStream.java:241) ~[?:1.8.0_121]
        at java.io.FilterOutputStream.close(FilterOutputStream.java:159) ~[?:1.8.0_121]
        at java.io.FilterOutputStream.close(FilterOutputStream.java:159) ~[?:1.8.0_121]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.RegionFileCache.e(RegionFileCache.java:122) ~[patched_1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1079]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.ChunkRegionLoader.b(ChunkRegionLoader.java:218) ~[patched_1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1079]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.ChunkRegionLoader.c(ChunkRegionLoader.java:196) [patched_1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1079]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.FileIOThread.c(FileIOThread.java:35) [patched_1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1079]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.FileIOThread.run(FileIOThread.java:28) [patched_1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1079]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [?:1.8.0_121]

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
1.关闭Paper-io
2. 更新服务端到build 1104
  build 1093修复了一改关于区块保存的问题
  https://github.com/PaperMC/Paper ... fda9293bbcd88752c2f
